summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3325, for the improvement of 15th Avenue Northeast, from East 55th Street to Street Railway Right of Way, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41060 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
